China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 25 日星期四 09:37:15 GMT 120
China slams US 'provocation' in Taiwan Strait, pledges further drillsChina criticised the United States on Thursday for causing "trouble and provocation" after the U.S. Navy sailed its first warship through the sensitive Taiwan Strait since presidential and parliamentary elections on the island. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 09:31:31 GMT RO5PDATDPJMDVHIHCCUQWVAFJM https://www.reuters.com/world/china-slams-us-pro Vocation-taiwan-strait-pledges-further-drills-2024-01-25/Reuters世界
China says Boeing has permission to resume 737 MAX 8 deliveriesChina said on Thursday it has given Boeing permission to resume deliveries of its 737 MAX 8 to local customers, ending an import freeze on the U.S. planemaker's most profitable jets which was put in place shortly after its first delivery in 2019. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 09:23:36 GMT 6JHYL3WPENP3VHCSTNKKPRWBSY https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/china-says-boeing-has-permission-resume-737-max-8-deliveries-2024-01-25/Eduardo Baptista, Sophie Yu商业航空航天与国防
India's Jindal Stainless cuts export forecast on Red Sea crisis, weaker EU, US demandIndia's Jindal Stainless Ltd has cut its exports forecast for the fiscal year ending March due to freight disruptions in the Red Sea and faltering demand in Europe and the United States, a top executive said. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 08:47:37 GMT OX6TMYZXFJN77MKIO5PGUU2XXA https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/indias-jindal-stainless-cuts-export-forecast-red-sea-crisis-weaker-eu-us-demand-2024-01-25/Neha Arora, Mayank Bhardwaj市场商品
New rules boost China property shares but could miss the mark, analysts sayChinese property shares rose on Thursday, strengthened by the latest relaxation in credit measures to support the embattled real estate industry, but few market participants expected them to overcome banks' reluctance to lend. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 08:36:08 GMT WG57JZSBUZL3LPXRHYAKI4Z6YI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/new-rules-boost-china-property-shares-could-miss-mark-analysts-say-2024-01-25/Clare Jim市场宏观问题
China's defence ministry spokesperson says India border issue 'left over from history'A Chinese defence ministry spokesperson said on Thursday that India-China border tensions were "an issue left over from history and not the whole of China-India relations". Thu, 25 Jan 2024 08:23:22 GMT CBKIVTZRQBIZXKSESG5FJT4SYE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinas-defence-ministry-spokesperson-says-india-border-issue-left-over-history-2024-01-25/Reuters世界亚太地区
Asian FX bears gain momentum as hopes of early US rate cuts waneBearish bets on multiple emerging Asian currencies gained momentum as traders adjusted their bets on early rate cuts by the U.S. Federal Reserve, driving investors to the safe-haven dollar, according to a Reuters poll. Thu, 25 Jan 2024 07:24:48 GMT A566GOHFIBKVHKFQ5LWDDXQQ2M https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/asian-fx-bears-gain-momentum-hopes-early-us-rate-cuts-wane-2024-01-25/Archishma Iyer市场宏观问题
